author: FuNipz
comment: Don't bother. There are much better alternatives on the Play Store.
title: I installed the app just to rate it

author: Adrian McKee
comment: The vibration is fine but i don't need an ear spltting siren. Why no myte option?
title: Too loud

author: Rob Watkins
comment: This alarm went off while I was on a plane taxing out to take off and I almost got kicked off. Perhaps a more subtle tone?

reply.author: BruceDu
reply.content: I'm so sorry about what happened. There are possibilities that sometimes this app alarms incorrectly. We strongly suggest use only for entertainment.

title: Not good.
